Bitstamp launches Bitstamp-as-a-service in the US
Bitstamp USA launches flexible, scalable institutional plug-and-play service as a result of growing demand for crypto adoption
We’re listing five new assets: IMX, NEXO, CTSI, CVX and UST
We continue our month of impressive new asset listings with IMX, NEXO, CTSI, CVX, and UST.
We've obtained two new certifications, further boosting our security and reliability
Bitstamp acquired the SOC2 Type 2 and ISO/IEC 27001 certifications, demonstrating our ongoing commitment to security, accountability, reliability, and transparency.
Bitstamp USA expands team with 3 key hires
Bitstamp's global leadership team grows with addition of Chief Legal Officer, Head of Marketing and US Head of Product & Strategy.
Bitstamp leverages Notabene’s software to comply with Travel Rule in Singapore, the US and EU
Bitstamp has implemented Notabene’s end-to-end solution for crypto regulatory compliance to comply with global Travel Rule regulations across the US, EU and Singapore.
We have a new CTO and promoted key personnel to strengthen our global team
To support the growth of cryptocurrency industry, we are bringing on several key hires and promoting internal talent.
We have two newcomers – Avalanche (AVAX) and Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC).
We’ve lowered the minimum order size on some trading pairs
To reflect the growth of the crypto market and give you more flexibility when it comes to small trades, we’re decreasing the minimum order size on all of our trading pairs.
Catch up on our latest Bitstamp Talks

The inaugural keynotes at “Bitstamp Talks: DeFi Expectations” has set the tone for a constructive
debate around the future of blockchain technology and its applications.
BANK HOLIDAY: 21 February 2022 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming federal US holiday on Monday, February 21, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.
